Texts.Chs: 我从天人之眼的残骸中找到了一台防护罩发生器。它看起来还能用，但是所有的连接都烧坏了...^green;也许某个研究天人技术的人可以帮我修好它。^reset;
Texts.Eng: I recovered a shield generator from an Oculus's wreckage. It still looks functional, but all of the connections have been fried... ^green;Perhaps someone who studies Centensian technology can repair it for me.^reset;

Texts.Chs: 这是来自天人之眼的一处部件吗？难以置信！我想我可能知道怎么让它重新运行起来。
Texts.Eng: Is this a part from a Ce'Tennan Oculus? Incredible! I think I might know how to get it operational again.
